verses.verse: "I am <WG1510> the true <WG228> vine, <WG288> and My Father <WG3962> is the vinedresser. <WG1092>

"Every <WG3956> branch <WG2814> in Me that does not bear <WG5342> fruit, <WG2590> He takes <WG142> away; <WG142> and every <WG3956> [branch] that bears <WG5342> fruit, <WG2590> He prunes <WG2508> it, that it may bear <WG5342> more <WG4183> fruit. <WG2590>
"You are already <WG2235> clean <WG2513> because <WG1223> of the word <WG3056> which <WG3739> I have spoken <WG2980> to you.

"Abide <WG3306> in Me, and I in you. As the branch <WG2814> cannot <WG1410> <WG3756> bear <WG5342> fruit <WG2590> of itself, <WG1438> unless <WG1437> <WG3361> it abides <WG3306> in the vine, <WG288> so <WG3779> neither <WG3761> [can] you, unless <WG1437> <WG3361> you abide <WG3306> in Me.

"I am <WG1510> the vine, <WG288> you are the branches; <WG2814> he who abides <WG3306> in Me, and I in him, he bears <WG5342> much <WG4183> fruit; <WG2590> for apart <WG5565> from Me you can <WG1410> do <WG4160> nothing. <WG3756> <WG3762>

"If <WG1437> anyone <WG5100> does not abide <WG3306> in Me, he is thrown <WG906> away <WG1854> as a branch, <WG2814> and dries <WG3583> up; and they gather <WG4863> them, and cast <WG906> them into the fire, <WG4442> and they are burned. <WG2545>
"If <WG1437> you abide <WG3306> in Me, and My words <WG4487> abide <WG3306> in you, ask <WG154> whatever <WG3739> <WG1437> you wish, <WG2309> and it shall be done <WG1096> for you.
"By this <WG3778> is My Father <WG3962> glorified, <WG1392> that you bear <WG5342> much <WG4183> fruit, <WG2590> and [so] prove <WG1096> to be My disciples. <WG3101>
"Just <WG2531> as the Father <WG3962> has loved <WG25> Me, I have also <WG2532> loved <WG25> you; abide <WG3306> in My love. <WG26>

"If <WG1437> you keep <WG5083> My commandments, <WG1785> you will abide <WG3306> in My love; <WG26> just <WG2531> as I have kept <WG5083> My Father's commandments, <WG1785> and abide <WG3306> in His love. <WG26>
"These <WG3778> things <WG3778> I have spoken <WG2980> to you, that My joy <WG5479> may be in you, and [that] your joy <WG5479> may be made <WG4137> full. <WG4137>
"This <WG3778> is My commandment, <WG1785> that you love <WG25> one <WG240> another, <WG240> just <WG2531> as I have loved <WG25> you.
"Greater <WG3173> love <WG26> has <WG2192> no <WG3762> one <WG3762> than this, <WG3778> that one <WG5100> lay <WG5087> down <WG5087> his life <WG5590> for his friends. <WG5384>
"You are My friends, <WG5384> if <WG1437> you do <WG4160> what <WG3739> I command <WG1781> you.

"No <WG3765> longer <WG3765> do I call <WG3004> you slaves, <WG1401> for the slave <WG1401> does not know <WG3609> what <WG5101> his master <WG2962> is doing; <WG4160> but I have called <WG3004> you friends, <WG5384> for all <WG3956> things <WG3956> that I have heard <WG191> from My Father <WG3962> I have made <WG1107> known <WG1107> to you.

"You did not choose <WG1586> Me, but I chose <WG1586> you, and appointed <WG5087> you, that you should go <WG5217> and bear <WG5342> fruit, <WG2590> and [that] your fruit <WG2590> should remain, <WG3306> that whatever <WG3739> <WG5100> <WG302> you ask <WG154> of the Father <WG3962> in My name, <WG3686> He may give <WG1325> to you.
"This <WG3778> I command <WG1781> you, that you love <WG25> one <WG240> another. <WG240>
"If <WG1487> the world <WG2889> hates <WG3404> you, you know <WG1097> that it has hated <WG3404> Me before <WG4413> [it hated] you.

"If <WG1487> you were of the world, <WG2889> the world <WG2889> would love <WG5368> its own; <WG2398> but because <WG3754> you are not of the world, <WG2889> but I chose <WG1586> you out of the world, <WG2889> therefore <WG1223> <WG3778> the world <WG2889> hates <WG3404> you.

"Remember <WG3421> the word <WG3056> that I said <WG3004> to you, 'A slave <WG1401> is not greater <WG3173> than his master. <WG2962>' If <WG1487> they persecuted <WG1377> Me, they will also <WG2532> persecute <WG1377> you; if <WG1487> they kept <WG5083> My word, <WG3056> they will keep <WG5083> yours <WG5212> also. <WG2532>
"But all <WG3956> these <WG3778> things <WG3778> they will do <WG4160> to you for My name's sake, <WG1223> because <WG3754> they do not know <WG3609> the One who sent <WG3992> Me.
"If <WG1487> I had not come <WG2064> and spoken <WG2980> to them, they would not have <WG2192> sin, <WG266> but now <WG3568> they have <WG2192> no <WG3756> excuse <WG4392> for their sin. <WG266>
"He who hates <WG3404> Me hates <WG3404> My Father <WG3962> also. <WG2532>

"If <WG1487> I had not done <WG4160> among <WG1722> them the works <WG2041> which <WG3739> no <WG3762> one <WG3762> else <WG243> did, <WG4160> they would not have <WG2192> sin; <WG266> but now <WG3568> they have both <WG2532> seen <WG3708> and hated <WG3404> Me and My Father <WG3962> as well. <WG2532>

"But [they have done this] in order <WG2443> that the word <WG3056> may be fulfilled <WG4137> that is written <WG1125> in their Law, <WG3551> 'They hated <WG3404> Me without <WG1431> a cause. <WG1431>'

"When <WG3752> the Helper <WG3875> comes, <WG2064> whom <WG3739> I will send <WG3992> to you from the Father, <WG3962> [that is] the Spirit <WG4151> of truth, <WG225> who <WG3739> proceeds <WG1607> from the Father, <WG3962> He will bear <WG3140> witness <WG3140> of Me,
and you [will] bear <WG3140> witness <WG3140> also, <WG2532> because <WG3754> you have been <WG1510> with Me from the beginning. <WG746>
